metadata.title: CVE-2019-11471 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libheif 1.4.0 has a use-after-free inheif::HeifContext::Image::set_alpha_channel in heif_context.h becauseheif_context.cc mishandles references to non-existing alpha images.

criterions.comment: libheif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
